lead_paragraph: Already underdogs, the Cavaliers may also be undermanned for Game 3 of the NBA Finals.

headline.print_headline: Down 2-0, Cavs May Be Without Love in Game 3 of NBA Finals
headline.main: Down 2-0, Cavs May Be Without Love in Game 3 of NBA Finals
